name: Shinsetsu Kamiya Ukyo 2
overview: This game probably has one of the most disturing game intros I've seen on the PC-98, and the rest of the game follows the intro rather well. It's an adventure game that really is almost a visual novel, with only a couple of binary choices for you to make. You date on of two girls, and frequently, get horrifically killed by some knife wielding nut in the endings.
